name: Messagemind
overview:
Serving a growing list of global 2000 enterprises, Messagemind is a corporate social intelligence company that provides cutting-edge technology solutions for companies and executives. Messagemind allows companies to tap their entire relationship network and cut through the noise, enhancing performance, increasing access to critical resources and saving time.

Messagemind helps enterprises around the world improve performance by harnessing their collective social intelligence and managing information overload. Its patented technology is unique in the way it captures and combines an organization’s collective internal social intelligence with external social networks, public internet content and business directories.

products.name: InboxMind – Dynamic Prioritization™ of Inbox, smart workflow management & email analytics
Shared InboxMind – Shared Mailbox workflow management, email analytics for mailboxes with multiple users
ExpertMind - maps organization-wide experts and their professional networks, automatically without depending on user data input, from multiple IT Systems and external social networks

RelationshipSync – Up-to-date and complete firm-wide contacts’ address book created by automatically extracting, cleaning and enhancing contacts mined from email communications, address books, calendars, multiple CRM instances, and other in-house IT appli
